name: Earthworm Jim
description: Now you can eat dirt on the road. Earthworm Jim, winner of the Die-Hard Game Fan's Game of the Year, Game Player's Ultimate and Electronic Gaming Monthly's Genesis Game of the Year has wormed his way onto the Game Boy. This is the highest coversion from a 16-bit to a hand-held ever! Now the head swinging, blaze blastin' action is totally mobile. So you can eat dirt everywhere you go!
